description: Boh is Yubaba`s son. Although he has the appearance of a young baby, he is twice Yubaba`s size. He is also very strong and can be dangerous. Yubaba goes out of her way to give him whatever he wants. When Zeniba turns Boh into a mouse, he becomes good friends with Chihiro and eventually stands up to Yubaba to protect Chihiro.
name: Bou
